titleStmt.title: A commentary in Englyshe vpon Sayncte Paules Epystle to the Ephesyans for the instruccyon of them that be vnlerned in tonges, gathered out of the holy scriptures and of the olde catholyke doctours of the churche, and of the beste authors that nowe a dayes do wryte. Anno. D. 1540 Per Lancelotum Ridleum Cantabrigensem.
Commentary in Englyshe upon Sayncte Paules Epystle to the Ephesyans.
titleStmt.author: Ridley, Lancelot, d. 1576.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
